alert.note: Alert for Maricopa; Yuma (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 18 at 6:32PM MST until August 18 at 7:15PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: The National Weather Service in Phoenix has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Yuma County in southwestern Arizona... Maricopa County in south central Arizona... * Until 715 PM MST. * At 632 PM MST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Paloma, or 48 miles west of Gila Bend, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Dateland, Sentinel, Paloma and Hyder. This includes AZ Interstate 8 between mile markers 59 and 88. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
